participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and passionate about food, always eager to learn and experience new cultures.
participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and resilient, dedicated to serving my country and finding a way to succeed despite challenges.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
